EmailTemplate.subject: Virtualization Monitoring vs. Whole Stack Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NO MATTER YOUR HYPERVISOR
We Want You to Be Healthy.
Forever and Free, As Monitoring Should Be.
Why is our monitoring free forever? Because we aren't in the monitoring business. We're in the control business. What are we talking about? Here's our take on Monitoring vs. Control <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-vs-control/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhmnurture>. No SMB, Enterprise, or Lemonade Stand should ever have to pay for a virtual monitoring tool. Need help installing? Contact us <mailto:%20%3Csales@vmturbo.com%3E>. We want you to be healthy. Thank you for downloading, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
